tool.name: ART 454
tool.command:
mkdir $output.files_path/;
art_454 $t $a $s #if $p -p $p #end if
#if $r -r $r #end if
#if $c -c $c #end if
#if $generate.amplicon.use_amplicon == "amplicon_true": #if $generate.choice == "single_end": -A #else: -B #end if #end if
$input_seq_file $output.files_path/output
#if $generate.choice == "single_end": $fold_coverage #else: $fold_coverage $fragment_size $fragment_sd #end if
#if $generate.amplicon.use_amplicon == "amplicon_true": #if $generate.choice == "single_end": $generate.amplicon.reads_per_amplicon #else: $generate.amplicon.read_pairs_per_amplicon #end if #end if > $output;
## Move $output.files_path/output* to correct locations
#if $generate.choice == "single_end": mv $output.files_path/output.fq $output_fq1; #else: mv $output.files_path/output1.fq $output_fq1; mv $output.files_path/output2.fq $output_fq2; #end if
#if $a == '-a': #if $generate.choice == "single_end": mv $output.files_path/output.aln $output_aln1; #else: mv $output.files_path/output1.aln $output_aln1; mv $output.files_path/output2.aln $output_aln2; #end if #end if
#if $s == '-s': mv $output.files_path/output.sam $output_sam; #end if

param.label: the fold of read coverage over the reference sequences
param.name: fold_coverage

param.label: number of reads per amplicon (for 5'end amplicon sequencing)
param.name: reads_per_amplicon

param.label: the average DNA fragment size for paired-end read simulation
param.name: fragment_size

param.label: the standard deviation of the DNA fragment size for paired-end read simulation
param.name: fragment_sd

param.label: number of read pairs per amplicon (for two-end amplicon sequencing)
param.name: read_pairs_per_amplicon

param.label: indicate to simulate reads from the built-in GS FLX Titanium profile (-t)
param.name: t

param.label: specify a fixed random seed for the simulation (-r)
param.name: r

param.label: specify the number of flow cycles by the sequencer [100 for GS-FLX, 200 for GS-FLX Titanium] (-c)
param.name: c

param.label: Specify user's own read profile for simulation (-p)
param.name: p
